text: Zdzisław Zbigniew Podkański (18 October 1949 – 18 February 2022) was a Polish politician. Podkański was born Guzówka, Poland. He was a member of the European Parliament from 2004 until 2009. He was a member of the Polish People's Party. Podkański was also in the Sejm from 1993 until 2004. Podkański died on 18 February 2022 in Warsaw, Poland at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:MEPs for Poland
title: Zdzisław Podkański
